LightGuard Pre-Installation Information
Thank you for choosing LightGuard! This application allows you to easily manage your screen brightness and contrast. 
Before proceeding with the installation, please review 

the following details:

📌 System Requirements
- Operating System: Windows 10 or later
- Storage: At least 50MB of free space
- Permissions: The application runs in the system tray and may require administrator permissions to adjust display settings.

⚙️ Installation Steps
- Run the installer (LightGuard_Setup.exe).
- Accept the license agreement (you can review details in the LICENSE.txt file).
- Choose the installation location or proceed with the default directory.
- Complete the installation and launch the application.

🔎 Key Features
- Option to start automatically with Windows.
- Save custom settings and use keyboard shortcuts.
- Schedule brightness and contrast adjustments based on time.
